attributes.action: Allow 16 Year Olds To Drive Derestricted Scooters (50cc)...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign This Petition If You Agree That Restricted 50cc Scooters Are Dangerous... Restricted Scooters Hold Up Traffic And Make Cars Overtake In Unsafe Areas, This Means An Avoidable Accident. For 16 Year Olds They Want To Cruise With The Cars At Their Local Crusing Street, If They Are Struggling To Do 30 Cars Do Get Annoyed And Usually Result In A Hit And Run Or An Assault. Sign This Petition If You Agree That 16 Year Olds Should Be Legal To Drive Derestricted Scooters ( 50cc)
